text:
@dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Really?!... When a full quarter of those that have died in the US, did so because Governor Cuomo ordered senior living hospitals to take Covid19 positive patients! And this clown in March! 
By March 2nd, Trump's COVID19 taskforce was ALREADY 2 months old! Give me a fu... Break! https://t.co/qBuxpG8nIc
